mapper.sql: id, hotelname, hotelcontactname, regtime, detailaddr, longitude, latitude, opentime, repairtime, roomnum, businesslicensefront, businesslicenseback, hotelpms, isvisible, isonline, idcardfront, idcardback, retentiontime, defaultleavetime, hotelphone, hoteltype, discode, qtphone, citycode, provcode, pmstype

h.id, h.hotelname, h.hotelcontactname, h.regtime, h.detailaddr, h.longitude, h.latitude, h.opentime, h.repairtime, h.roomnum, h.businesslicensefront, h.businesslicenseback, h.hotelpms, h.isvisible, h.isonline, h.idcardfront, h.idcardback, h.retentiontime, h.defaultleavetime, h.hotelphone, h.hoteltype, h.discode, h.qtphone, h.citycode, h.provcode, h.pmstype,h.introduction
mapper.select:
select
distinct
,
from hotel
order by ${orderByClause}

SELECT MAX(cost) AS maxprice,MIN(cost) AS minprice,
FROM hotel h LEFT JOIN roomtype r ON h.`id`=r.`hotelid`
GROUP BY r.`hotelid`

SELECT MAX(cost) AS maxprice,MIN(cost) AS minprice,
FROM hotel h LEFT JOIN roomtype r ON h.`id`=r.`hotelid` where r.`hotelid`=#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} GROUP BY r.`hotelid`

select
distinct
from hotel
order by ${orderByClause}
